title: 4V5s should not result in loss of LP
body: I have played a lot of ranked games that have started as or ended up as 4v5s That is not a fair matchup no matter player skill. Losing LP when you lose a 4v5 is a slap to the face of anyone trying to climb. The game already recolonizes that a player has gone afk in the post game by red texting their name. So the game CAN recognize a 4v5. It is not fair for players to be punished for not being able to play a fair matchup.    Cant riot implement a LP loss discount or even LP loss waiver for a an unfair match.

replies.body:
If you don't want to lose LP if you lose a 4v5 you have to be willing to not gain any if you win a 5v4. The system as it is works, your teammates will leave just as much as theirs, if your teammates are leaving a lot more than the enemies chances are it is something you are doing as that is the only difference between the two teams, you are on one, and not on the other.

The same applies to trolls... Technically if you count everyone as a blank face, and assume you will neither disconnect nor troll, the enemy team will statistically have a higher amount of games with leaves and trolls... again though that assumes that you yourself are not the cause of them trolling or leaving.

Not all games will be fair, but if you are really struggling to regain 1 games worth of LP you are in a good and fair mmr for yourself skillwise.
Think about how easily that could be abused.

Oh i know it is abusable. I am not suggesting its an easy fix, but it still needs to be looked at. I am sick of loosing LP for i game i never had a chance of winning before minion spawn because some one has a bad connection or didn't get their role and trolls.
I agree, frustrating. My main recently got permabanned for swearing at people who spent 30min just trying to troll the living daylight out of me.

Hmm.
Perhaps if they made a system that if you lose a 4v5 you lose no LP, but the other team gains full LP.
To prevent this from being exploited, there should be measures in place.

I seem to lose more lp from losing when in a 3-4 person team than when all team plays...like we are getting punished extra hard for having some piece of crap afk leave the game.

Penalties for people that deliberately leave the game or sit at base because they get the sulks etc need to be much more than they are (is there actually a real penalty for leaving a game?) These scum not only lose the game but they usually cause the rest of the team to lose. It shouldnt matter what sort of game it is, someone going afk/quitting any game really sucks.
